definitions.definition: One who, or that which, reverts.
One who reverts to that religion which one had adhered to before having converted to another.

labels: due to the belief that all people are born Muslim
definitions.label_groups: Islam , due to the belief that all people are born Muslim

definitions.definition: The act of reversion (of e.g. a database transaction or source control repository ) to an earlier state.
examples: We've found that git reverts are at least an order of magnitude faster than SVN reverse merges.

definitions.definition: The skateboard maneuver of rotating the board 180 degrees or more while the wheels remain on the ground.

main_definition: One who, or that which, reverts.
secondary_definitions: ( religion ) One who reverts to that religion which one had adhered to before having converted to another.
( Islam , due to the belief that all people are born Muslim ) A convert to Islam .
( computing ) The act of reversion (of e.g. a database transaction or source control repository ) to an earlier state.
The skateboard maneuver of rotating the board 180 degrees or more while the wheels remain on the ground.
